title: Bab Zuwaila as seen from Sharia al-Muizz
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Collector's note: 24 Bâb Zowaïlah (Porte de la ville) Vue generale du Nord - The Bāb Zuwayla, from within. Translation of note: 24 Bab Zuwayla (Door of the city) General view from North.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Bab Zuwaila as seen from Sharia al-Muizz
